body: ### Age of Exploration My personal programming projects are hosted at the link below. I am not yet a professional, but I am doing what I can to build up some experience by programming and I hope sometime soon to get involved (constructively!) with the open-source community. If you have any feedback on my code, please contact me--via GitHub preferably. I would really appreciate criticism. Information about my technical qualifications and other skills can be found on my
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: The Techpriest
